protein.general_function: Involved in armadillo repeat domain binding
protein.specific_function: Binds calmodulin in a calcium dependent manner. May function as scaffolding or signaling protein

reference.reference_text: Muro Y, Chan EK, Landberg G, Tan EM: A cell-cycle nuclear autoantigen containing WD-40 motifs expressed mainly in S and G2 phase cells. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1995 Feb 27;207(3):1029-37.
